pageContext.claim: “The United States will not allow other countries to impose massive Tariffs and Trade Barriers on its farmers, workers and companies. While sending their product into our country tax free. We have put up with Trade Abuse for many decades — and that is long enough.”
pageContext.analysis: The U.S. also imposes tariffs and has other barriers on imports; it's not a "tax free" situation, as he says. Trump complains about tariffs imposed by other countries but the United States supports American farmers with subsidies that other countries complain gives them an unfair competitive advantage. China, for instance, complains that subsidies from the U.S. government have given American soybean farmers an unfair competitive advantage in selling to China.
